criteria.name: Classifies as architectural decision
criteria.description: Correctly identifies this as architectural (not tactical/foundational)

criteria.name: Uses proper ADR format
criteria.description: Includes Status, Context, Decision, Alternatives, Consequences sections

criteria.name: Documents alternatives with rationale
criteria.description: Lists all 3 options with pros/cons analysis

criteria.name: Explains chosen decision clearly
criteria.description: States the selected approach and why it was chosen

criteria.name: Documents risks and mitigation
criteria.description: Identifies potential problems and how to address them

criteria.name: Includes validation steps
criteria.description: Specifies how to verify the decision works (peer review, etc.)

criteria.name: Applies architectural dependency checks
criteria.description: Considers dependency direction and coupling implications
